features: EASY ACCESS TO FOOD AND COUNTERTOP: Easily access food in the toaster oven broiler and on your countertop with the Easy Reach roll-top door.
FITS A 9" x 11" BAKE PAN, 6 SLICES OF TOAST OR A 12" PIZZA: This Hamilton Beach toaster oven has a spacious interior with plenty of room for cooking everything from snacks to side dishes.
EASY TO KEEP CLEAN WHILE COOKING: The roll-top door stays up and out of the way of messy spills and drips when opened. The door and slide-out crumb tray are both removable for cleaning.

COOK YOUR WAY WITH 3 COOKING FUNCTIONS: This toaster oven bakes, broils and toasts. It has 2 rack positions,1400 watts of power, and a temperature range of 150 to 450º F. It's great for everyday cooking tasks.

SIMPLE MANUAL CONTROLS: This toaster oven has manual controls that are easy to use. Great for anyone who wants a toaster oven that gets the job done without being complicated. Includes 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.
body.description: You won't find a design Like the Hamilton Beach 6 slice easy reach toaster oven with Roll-Top Door anywhere else. Its unique and large opening make food easy to reach. And since the door opens above the oven, It frees up your countertop space in front. Best of all, it's easy to keep clean Because food can't spill on the door.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cook Your Way with 3 Cooking Functions This toaster oven gives you the versatility to bake, broil and toast. It has 2 rack positions,1400 watts of power a wide temperature range of 150 to 450º F. It's great for everyday tasks like heating up leftovers, broiling chicken breasts and making toast.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven with Roll-Top Door The Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven has a door that rolls up and stays out of the way to give you easy access to the oven without blocking your countertop. Because it stays up and out the way of drips and spills, the door doesn't get as messy as traditional toaster oven doors. The door is also removable for easy cleaning. This toaster oven is the ideal size for everything from snacks to side dishes. It has a spacious interior that fits a 9" x 11" bake pan, 6 slices of toast or a 12" pizza. Fits a 9" x 11" bake pan, 6 slices of toast or a 12" pizza Cook your way with 3 cooking functions, 2 rack positions, 1400 watts of power and a wide temperature range of 150 to 450º F Has 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell that rings when the cooking cycle is complete and auto shutoff Includes a bake pan, oven rack and a slide-out crumb tray for cleaning

Easy Access to Food and Countertop Easily access food in the oven and on your countertop with the Easy Reach roll-top door. Fits a 9" x 11" Pan, 6 Slices of Toast or 12" Pizza The toaster oven has a spacious interior with plenty of room for cooking everything from snacks to side dishes. Simple Manual Controls The toaster oven has manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff. Includes Bake Pan, Oven Rack & Crumb Tray The toaster oven has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking, an oven rack for broiling and a slide-out crumb tray. When broiling foods on the oven rack, the bake pan rests on the supports below to catch drippings.

6-Slice Countertop Toaster Oven with Easy Reach Roll-Top Door 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven with Rotisserie 6-Slice Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven with Easy Reach Door 11.6 QT Digital Air Fryer Oven with Rotisserie and Rotating Basket Toaster Oven ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Convection ✓ Sure-Crisp Air Fry ✓ Air Fryer ✓ Rotisserie ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design and solid quality
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this toaster oven twice daily for almost 2 years and it has worked flawlessly.Pros:- Lift-up lid makes it easier to load and unload.- Cooks very evenly.- Easy to use controls.- Rounded back section on the inside makes it ideal for pizza.- 1,400 watts delivers plenty of power while leaving room on a standard 15-amp circuit to run other items.Cons: - None :)I hope they keep making these because when this one eventually wears out, I am definitely buying another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ok here's the deal I have had 2 toaster ovens before I got this one. The first was some off brand (cheap) worked until the glass door kept sticking/jamming but I could open it then one day it jammed so bad I jerked it open and the glass busted in a ton of pieces. The 2nd one I ordered came and it was Proctor Silex but I didn't use it was too small and seemed cheap made. I exchanged it for this Hamilton Beach love of my life toaster oven hahaha Let me tell you if you don't buy this one you really messed up! This bad boy is awesome! I have used it a few times and wow now I know what a toaster oven is supposed to be. I could go on and on but I'm telling you nothing cheap about it, works great, love the lift up door and FYI someone said it's a little hard to clean that would be a no. I'm a man with big hands and it was no problem cleaning the glass door. Sorry to ramble buy for that kind of money I want you to know it's worth it. Thank you Hamilton Beach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's perfect for a one to two person household and the roll back door is great
reviews.reviewText: The best thing I like about this oven is the roll back door. Not a lot of whistles and bells - It's your basic "Plain" appliance, but it works great. The timer was a bit of a surprise because it only goes up to 30 minutes, which means, if I want to bake an item longer I need to make sure I hear the timer go off to reset additional time for cooking an item that takes longer. It is compact and that is a great thing for a small kitchen. However, I can still cook or warm up a good size pizza. It is very easy to clean and it looks good on the counter. And, it fits my cooking needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Counter top OVEN. Love IT!
reviews.reviewText: this was just what I wanted. super convenient for small meals that you don't want to heat up the whole big oven for. I love the way the door opens upwards, It gives lots of room. Bakes well. I am really happy with this choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have had this toaster oven now for about 11/2 months. It fits nicely in a relatively small space and looks nice. The fact that the contents are slanted away from you and its unique hinged opening due to its design makes it less likely that you will burn yourself when taking toast, etc., out of the unit. It also uses 1400 watts making it acceptable for the average 15 amp household wiring. Those toaster units that are for example 1800 watts (above 1500 watts) need a 20 amp electrical line, which is probably not available in the average older household causing possible wire and electrical outlet overheating. The unit is simple to operate (a plus for my wife who does not like complexity). Note that this unit gets hot so the power cord should not be touching the back of the unit. So far we are pleased with this toaster oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Toaster Oven
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fan of the toaster oven. My old Black & Decker toaster oven got damaged. I took a chance on this model as I like the ability to cook a small frozen pizza in this.It's pretty easy to clean and just as easy to use. Sure, it takes up a little more space, but worth it. The way it cooks a Screaming Sicilian frozen pizza is awesome and evenly baked! I have even made a small batch of stuffed shells that turned out pretty good.I sure hope this is a long lasting toaster oven, I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR RV
reviews.reviewText: JUST WHAT I WANTED ,WORKS GREAT , DOES WARM UP THE TRAILER ,BUT THATS WHAT IT SUPPOSED TO DO DAH

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO BURNS OPENING THIS OVEN !
reviews.reviewText: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS TOASTER OVEN. THE DESIGN ALLOWS THE DOOR TO LIFT UP AND OVER TO OPEN AND STAYS OPEN, INSTEAD OF SIDE TO SIDE DOORS BANGING INTO YOU OR WHAT YOU ARE TAKING OUT THE OVEN. BOTTOM TRAYS LIFT OUT EASILY TO CLEAN UNLIKE THE OLD TYPE BUMPING AND HITTING YOUR HANDS AND ARMS AS YOU REACH FOR THAT HOT ITEM. THE INSIDE IS UNBELIEVABLY EASY TO CLEAN. THE CRUMB TRAY AND BOTTOM CLEAN OUT TRAY COME OUT WITH EASE. I HAVE MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS AND MY HANDS LOVE TO "DANCE" SO I NEVER KNOW WHEN THEY MIGHT GIVE ME A LITTLE JUMP...WITH THIS SUPER TOASTER OVEN I AM NEVER NERVOUS WHEN I COOK WITH IT!! I MUST SOUND CRAZY BECAUSE I'M GOING ON ABOUT THIS TOASTER OVEN, BUT I TRULY FEEL SAFE USING IT. LOOKS GREAT ON MY COUNTER WITH EASY TO USE CONTROLS, HONESTLY CAN YOU BELIEVE IT? SERIOUSLY, HAVING SOMETHING IN THE KITCHEN THAT ISN'T DIGITAL IS A HUGE BREATH OF FRESH AIR. NO BEEPS, OR SLIPS WITH MY HANDS SETTING THE WRONG TIME, OR SHUTTING IT OFF!...NICE ROUND KNOBS TO TURN EASY AND I CAN SEE AND CLEAN THEM EASILY. I WISH ALL KITCHEN APPLIANCES WOULD HAVE GREAT DESIGNS LIKE MY LITTLE OVEN IT TRULY MAKES MY LIFE EASIER JUST WITH THE LITTLE OVEN THAT COULD!! 😝. 😊 MY REVIEW IS SO LONG NO ONE WILL BOTHER TO READ IT.. I HOPE THEY DO!. SINCERELY, V. PETTINE

No es muy grande pero realmente no es pequeño, quiero decir que lleva al menos 6 tapas de pan blanco acostadas en la parrilla y es como un tamaño medio, es cómodo pera poner en algún lugar de la cocina y que no estorbe, funciona correctamente para tostar y solo que si se quede tostar parejo hay que quitarle la bandeja que también trae para que se dore por arriba y abajo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little oven, not so great toaster
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace a Hamilton Beach 31512C that was fine, but suddenly stopped heating after 15 months. I bought an open box for around CDN 68. Arrived new without a scratch in a random box, with nothing missing, so it was a good deal.My main use is as a countertop oven, and it works well for that, and heats better than the 31512C even without convection, but I'm not sure I'd be happy if I mostly used it for toast, which takes longer than indicated on the timer. Can't store unused trays on top of the oven because the door swings up and over, however it's easy on counter space for that reason, so evens out.Main concern is the recommendation to unplug it after each use, which isn't practical for me, as it's plugged in behind the fridge. #YOLO

Me encantó! Está super bonito la verdad, amo el sistema de la puertita que se levanta y tienes acceso total al interior del horno (sobre todo para la limpieza), viene con la charola para hornear y una charolita extra para los residuos de comida que puedan caer, y aunque la temperatura sólo viene en °F pues hacemos la conversión y listo, es muy fácil de usar. Contenta con mi compra
Easy to follow instructions, easy to use. Temperatures are accurate.

All good, great toaster oven functionally, except you cannot easily clean the glass from inside because of the way it opens/design. Annoying little protective tab at the back of the toaster...rounded edge make it hard to stay in one place...slips easily.
